item.title: The Sydney Morning Herald Business: This email subject line could well be a business scam - Puntaje: 400
item.description: As phishing scam losses stack up, warnings issued about the everyday brands getting impersonated.

item.title: The Sydney Morning Herald Technology: Facebook to re-examine how live videos are flagged after Christchurch shooting - Puntaje: 200
item.description: Facebook said it would re-examine its "reporting logic" after its artificial intelligence systems failed to automatically detect the New Zealand mosque shooting video.
